tests.query:
-- Tags: shard

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t_00573 (x UInt8);
tests.name: 00573_shard_aggregation_by_empty_set.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(x), avg(x), avg(toNullable(x)), groupArray(x), groupUniqArray(x) FROM remote('127.0.0.{1..10}', system.one) WHERE (rand() AS x) < 0;
tests.name: 00573_shard_aggregation_by_empty_set.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(x), avg(x), avg(toNullable(x)), groupArray(x), groupUniqArray(x) FROM remote('127.0.0.{1..10}', system.one) WHERE (rand() AS x) < 0 GROUP BY x;
tests.name: 00573_shard_aggregation_by_empty_set.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(x), avg(x), avg(toNullable(x)), groupArray(x), groupUniqArray(x) FROM remote('127.0.0.{1..10}', system.one) WHERE (rand() AS x) < 0;
tests.name: 00573_shard_aggregation_by_empty_set.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(x), avg(x), avg(toNullable(x)), groupArray(x), groupUniqArray(x) FROM remote('127.0.0.{1..10}', system.one) WHERE (rand() AS x) < 0 GROUP BY x;
